CSSRound.summary: The round() CSS function returns a rounded number based on a selected rounding strategy.

remarks.para: Authors should use a custom CSS property (e.g., --my-property) for the rounding value, interval, or both; using the round() function is redundant if these have known values.

CSSRound.returns: The value of valueToRound, rounded to the nearest lower or higher integer multiple of roundingInterval, depending on the rounding strategy.
